Articles.Content: I'm wondering if someone has this same problem. When I switch parts to different stages the part gets "stuck" and I can't move it anymore. It actually stops directly over other parts. And once I used the middle scroll wheel on the mouse and the entire stage column disappeared through the top of the screen. This is making the game unplayable because once the part/stage disappears I can't tell when that stage will activate. I already sent a bug report but I just wanted to see if it's happening to anyone else.
